name: tokidoki frenzies (Match 3)
description:
Play with the characters from tokidoki universe, Unicorno, Moofia, Punkstar, and others, on tokidoki frenzies.
This is a new Match 3 Puzzle Game with additional exciting Game Modes!

Game Features
◆ Tons of various Stages for you to play. Still more Stages coming soon!
◆ Finish unique Level Targets and Obstacles to clear the Game.
◆ Meet the various exciting Tokidoki Friends!
◆ Explore the Tokidoki Friends world and get great Rewards!
◆ Special Puzzles and Items make the play even more fun: Popcorn, Missiles, Bombs, Gorillas, UFOs, and many others.

We hope you have a great time playing Tokidoki Friends, right now!
Tokidoki Friends is being updated every day.
Don’t forget to download the latest version to enjoy new content and levels!

** Check out the latest news at the official homepage.
- Our Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/tokidokifrenzies
